items.title: Nandish Shah of HDFC Sec recommends 'Bull Spread' strategy on M&M Finance
items.description: Long build up is seen in the M&M Finance futures during the September series till now where we have seen 7 per cent rise in 'Open' interest with price rising by 5 per cent

items.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: Sensex, Nifty headed for slow start, signal GIFT Nifty, mixed Asian cues
items.description: Stock Market LIVE Updates: Indian benchmark indices were likely headed for a slow start on Friday, weighed down by weak global cues.

items.title: Stocks to Watch, Sep 6: Glenmark Pharma, Godfrey, Max Fin Svcs, Pidilite
items.description: Indian benchmark indices were likley headed for a slow start on Friday, weighed down by global cues as investors awaited crucial jobs and payroll data in the US

items.title: Share Market Today: RIL nod for bonus, US jobs data, Bazaar Style IPO eyed
items.description: Share Market Today: US payroll data for August will decide the quantum of the upcoming rate cut. That apart, RIL's bonus approval, and Bazaar Style IPO listing will be on investors' radar
